attributeDefinition: botanical species name related to the name ID in the file data_raw_traits
abundance of species in the plot L1_01_2018 (landside, site, plot, survey year) after Braun-Blanquet (1964) refined by Londo (1976)
comment: Braun-Blanquet J (1964) Pﬂanzensoziologie: Grundzüge der Vegetationskunde (3rd ed.). Wien-New York: Springer (Original work published 1928) / Londo G (1976) The decimal scale for releves of permanent quadrats. Vegetatio 33, 61-64. DOI: 10.1007/BF00055300

attributeDefinition: abundance of species in the plot L1_01_seeded (landside, site, plot, weight ratio of seed mixture) after Braun-Blanquet (1964) refined by Londo (1976)
